description:
A sustainably minded update on a MEC classic. Performance ski mitts with tough polyurethane palms, drawcord toggles sized for small hands, and no leashes to get tangled. They keep hands warm even when wet, and allow moisture to evaporate away.

  • Recycled waterproof-breathable polyester ripstop shells with a DWR finish that sheds snow and repels light rain
  • Recycled high-loft insulation is heavier on back of hand for extra warmth, lighter on palms for easier grip
  • Recycled brushed polyester lining for comfort and warmth
  • Grippy polyurethane palm material extends up the fingerbox
  • Sniffle patch/goggle wipe on thumbs
  • Wrist strap secures mitts to hands
  • Quick-closing elastic drawcord to keep in warmth and keep out snow
  • Internal hand-me-down ID label
name: MEC Essential Mitts - Children to Youths
